SocialMediaPosting.headline: Miss Angeline Chalifoux’s Story - Pittsburgh Student - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope schools are a safe place for children to be themselves and explore new opportunities without acts of discrimination and microaggressions…”

– Miss Angeline Chalifoux, North Allegheny One Day Leader @NA_Schools https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/schools-safe-place-children-explore-opportunities-without-discrimination/
